0x6B5653E4.name: GET_PED_PROP_COLLECTION_NAME

params.name: anchorPoint
params.description: One of the anchor points from [SET_PED_PROP_INDEX](#\_0x93376B65A266EB5F)

0x6B5653E4.description:
An analogue to [GET_PED_PROP_INDEX](#\_0x898CC20EA75BACD8) that returns collection name instead of the global drawable index.

Should be used together with [GET_PED_PROP_COLLECTION_LOCAL_INDEX](#\_0xCD420AD1).
0x6B5653E4.resultsDescription: Collection name to which the current prop used in the given ped and anchor point belongs to. Returns null if Ped is not found, does not have a prop at the specified anchor point, or if the index is out of bounds.
